QuestData.Title: Gavrock
QuestData.Description: Without your help, we wouldn't have been able to turn the tide of the battle for Thor Modan. This ancient city has long been a battlefield between the forces of earth and stone. I can only hope we have silenced it for the last time.$B$BThe iron dwarves can still use their magic to capture and enslave my brothers. Gavrock is searching for a way to free the runed giants. Look for him on a small cluster of islands, called the Ruins of Tethys, off the central part of the Eastwind Shore to the south.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Gavrock at the Ruins of Tethys.
QuestData.RewardText: I know Kurun is glad for your help. The defeat of Thor Modan will be a great achievement for us, but it will not free our brothers.
